subsection.name: Properties
subsection.p: This is a list of all supported, Entry specific, properties, or standard properties that behave a certain way, which isn't default. (Entry overrides some properties so it can add his own logic) See the widget page for information about properties used for all widgets.

tr.td: This color will only be set when the field is required and not disabled. If it is disabled it will uset the disabled color
This will always be set when the entry is disabled
This color will be used as the default background and when the field is not disabled and not required
This specifies that this field will be enabled based on the value of another field. The fieldvalue should be able to return to true or false (mostly used icm with checkboxes)
Type can be field or string

The entryfields property allows you to specify which value of a bean you wish to show to the user (eg if the entry contains an Person object and you want to show the value of getLastName, you specifiy lastname as the entryfield.
